suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more varied strokes and shading techniques to the ball and parts of the dog's body. For the ball, you could use cross-hatching or stippling to create a sense of depth and texture. For the dog's body, especially the areas that appear more solid, try incorporating different line weights and directions to suggest fur texture and volume. This will add more visual interest and depth to these areas, complementing the already well-defined facial features and collar.
